<b>Coreston.com</b>, company is proud to offer viewers of LowEndTalk this exclusive offer !

Included with every server:
- UPS/Generator Backup Included
- N+1 Cooling
- 24x7 Server monitoring, support and hardware replacement
- Remote Reboot capability
- Free on-demand KVM/IP
- Linux OS : Choice of Linux VPS Hosting OS - CentOS, Fedora, Debian, Ubuntu, Gentoo, Slackware, FreeBSD
- Windows OS : Choice of Windows Hosting OS - Windows 2003 32/64bit, Windows 2008 32/64bit, Windows 2008 R2 64bit ,Windows 2012


Offers Bellow 

Intel Xeon 2x L5520
CPU Cores: 8 Cores / 16 Threads
16GB RAM
1TB SATA hard drives
Software RAID
10TB transfer
1Gbps uplink
Free 20 Gbps DDoS Mitigation
/29 IPv4
/48 IPv6
IPMI: yes
<strong>$49/month </strong>
Order link (<a href="https://cs.coreston.com/cart.php?a=add&amp;pid=1">https://cs.coreston.com/cart.php</a>)


Payment Methods: PayPal and credit card (Via Paypal)
